extends java.lang.Object
    Common utility methods for Plan elements.

    • Method Detail

      • assetConflicts

        public static boolean assetConflicts(PodInstanceRequirement asset,
                                     java.util.Collection<PodInstanceRequirement> dirtyAssets)
        Determines whether the specified asset refers to the same pod instance and tasks other assets.
        Parameters:
        asset - The asset of interest.
        dirtyAssets - Other assets which may conflict with the asset

      • getLaunchableTasks

      • isEligible

        public static boolean isEligible(Element element,
                                 java.util.Collection<PodInstanceRequirement> dirtyAssets)
        Returns whether the provided Plan Element is eligible for work.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to be checked
        dirtyAssets - list of current dirty assets which are already being worked on
        Returns:
        whether this element may proceed with work

      • getAggregateStatus

        public static Status getAggregateStatus(java.lang.String parentName,
                                        java.util.Collection<Status> childStatuses,
                                        java.util.Collection<Status> candidateStatuses,
                                        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> errors,
                                        boolean isInterrupted)
        Returns the overall status to display by a parent element of the provided children.
        Parameters:
        parentName - the name of the parent element, used for logging
        childStatuses - the statuses of the parent element's children
        candidateStatuses - the statuses of the parent element's candidate children, as selected by the parent element's Strategy
        errors - any errors from the parent element
        isInterrupted - whether the parent element is interrupted
        Returns:
        the Status to display for the parent element
